      public ChatRoomController​(IPubSubSyncManager pssManager, INamedConnector connectorStub, String chatRoomName, UUID chatRoomID, ChatAppModel mainModel, ChatAppView<INamedConnector> mainView)
      Constructor for the chat room controller.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomName - The name of the chat room
      pssManager - The PubSubSyncManager of the chat room
      connectorStub - The stub for the current member of the room
      chatRoomID - The chat room uuid
      mainModel - The main model that the chat room will be on
      mainView - The main view that the chat room will be displayed
